creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: reproduction: two men hiking on a jagged rock; temple complex at bottom, low mountains with pine trees in middle ground, and rooftops in the mist; large, crooked pine tree with other crooked trees in front of a building complex; two figures walking across a stone bridge that stretches over a mountain brook; cliff on the L with pine trees, jagged rocks, tall grasses with a fishing village and fishing boats; fishing boats sailing, at far L, two approach a high cliff with large pine trees; tall pagoda amidst a temple complex and tall, flat cliffs with pine trees; seascape with low mountains in distance; another seaside village with reeds, houses, fishing boats, and mountains; people walking over an arched bridge; jagged rocks and cliffs; lively village scene amidst tall cliffs; white building in front of soaring mountain; another temple complex; text at end
title: Landscape
